entries.stormtrooper_npc_do_job: I'll be interested to know when you're finished.
entries.stormtrooper_npc_go_home: Get out of the way if you're not going to help then.
entries.stormtrooper_npc_job_offer_3: Sure,  I've got some work that needs to be done.
entries.stormtrooper_npc_job_offer_2: I was supposed to do this myself, but I'm backlogged on paperwork, so maybe you can handle it.
entries.stormtrooper_npc_job_offer_1: There is something you can do for the empire, yes...
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_3_3: Don't make me call for backup.  Just step away slowly and I'll let you go unharmed.  Okay?
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_2_3: I don't have time to answer ANY kind of questions.
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_2_3: No, not those kinds of questions...
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_1_3: Sorry, I don't have time to answer questions.  Maybe you could try the Imperial Senate, or perhaps some of the local politicians.
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_1_3: I'd like to ask you some questions.
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_3_2: Ok, I'm going to have to ask you to back away slowly.  I need to get back to my job.
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_2_2: Uh...why don't you talk to the recruitment agents, I have to get back to work.
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_3_2: That's too much work.  Just sell me yours!
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_2_2: Oh.  Well, can I be a stormtrooper then?
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_1_2: This is the official uniform of the Imperial Stormtroopers.  You'd actually have to BE a stormtrooper to get one.
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_1_2: Where can I get a cool suit of armor like that?
entries.stormtrooper_npc_greet_2: Hail citizen.  What do you need?
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_2_1: That's it, I'm done talking to you.
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_3_1: Oh, well let me get out of your way.
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_2_1: So you admit there's something going on!
entries.stormtrooper_npc_response_1_1: Nothing that I can speak freely about...
entries.stormtrooper_player_line_1_1: I was just wondering what was going on around here.
entries.stormtrooper_npc_greet_1: Sorry citizen, but I'm on duty.  What can I do for you, quickly?
entries.u25: Have you heard the one about the Klatooinian, the Ithorian, and the Wookiee?
entries.u24: I imagine we won't be here long. They'll have us take out some little Rebel outpost, and we'll move again...
entries.u23: I've only gotten to ride in a walker once, but it was really very interesting...
entries.u21: What I want to know is why the Alliance has to go wrecking everything? Life is pretty good for most, isn't it?
entries.u19: All stations feel the same to me.
entries.u18: I've taken down a few SpecForce commandos in my day...
entries.u17: Yeah, but the real tough ones are the SpecForce guys. They make the regular Rebel army look pathetic.
entries.u15: He thinks he's all high and mighty because he's a Chiss. I hate aliens, I tell you.
entries.u14: This helmet gets hot, you know.
entries.u13: So the sergeant said to him,
entries.u11: So I said to the lieutenant,
entries.u10: I'd much rather be in the barracks right now.
entries.u9: I once had to escort a Wookiee prisoner, that was no fun, I'll tell you!
entries.u8: Guard duty's pretty bad, but at least I'm not getting shot at.
entries.u7: I really need to get my armor cleaned.
entries.u5: When does my relief get here anyway?
entries.u4: You know, things just haven't been the same since the Battle of Yavin.
entries.u3: I wonder if there's any Rebels around.
entries.u2: So how about this weather, huh?
entries.u1: I can't wait for my next furlough.
